name: Upwave
headline: Marketing analytics for the world's biggest brand marketers
description:
Upwave is the #1 marketing analytics platform for the world's biggest brand marketers.

Upwave's software shows marketers the impact and effectiveness of their brand investments.  We use data science and machine learning to answer an age-old question: does brand advertising work?

Upwave's enterprise platform is used by the blue-chip marketers like Unilever, Clorox, Verizon, American Express, T-Mobile, Corona, State Farm, Uber, and dozens more.

Upwave was launched in Y Combinator and is a fast-growing, post-Series B growth-stage startup.  We've raised from leading investors like Uncork Capital, Initialized Capital, Bloomberg Beta, PivotNorth, Industry Ventures, and Conductive Ventures...plus many leading marketing tech Founders & CEOs.

The company is based in San Francisco.

# The Brand Outcomes Measurement Platform
Upwave brings science to top-of-funnel–measuring Brand Lift, validating Brand Reach, and surfacing Brand Optimization opportunities in one, dynamic platform. With cross-channel brand measurement for CTV, Digital, Social, Linear, Addressable, Retail Media, Streaming Audio and more, Upwave maximizes the effectiveness of brand spend. 
[ Learn More ](http://www.upwave.com/<https:/www.upwave.com/platform-demo/>)
![image](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Screenshot-2024-11-07-at-12.01.07 PM-2.png)
![image](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-22-1.png)
![image](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-23-1.png)
![image](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-131.png)
![image](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Device-Macbook-Air_01.png)
![image](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Visualize-Your-Data-5-1-1-1.png)
# Dynamic, Real-Time Dashboard to Maximize Brand Lift
With Upwave’s real-time platform, marketers can create dynamic campaign dashboards, access all modules, and easily see if the campaign is driving lift.
###  Cross-Channel Coverage 
Cross-channel measurement with accurate, privacy-safe data in a unified dashboard for CTV, Digital, Social, Linear, Addressable, Retail Media, and Streaming Audio. 
###  Granular Cut-Level Controls 
Evaluate Brand Lift at a tactical level, giving granular insights to compare performance of media, creative and more. 
###  Better Math and Methodology 
Upwave’s methodology is designed, and meticulously checked, to ensure our sample is high-quality, census-representative and clean of bias or other interference. 
# Put a Performance Lens on Brand Investment
Upwave allows marketers to regularly measure, improve, and maximize with an always-on, analytical rigor for brand campaigns.
![image](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Device-Macbook-Air_2.png)
![image](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Group-18.png)
###  AI-Powered Insights and Reports 
Upwave uses AI to help customers turn data into digestible, on-demand insights both in-platform and available to download–at the click of a button. 
###  Actionable Optimization Recommendations 
Upwave’s Brand Optimization is purpose-built as a tool for decision makers to clearly understand over–and underperforming–tactics, without a statistician on staff. 
###  On-Target Profiles and Reach 
Upwave uses real attitudinal data and machine learning to verify whether a campaign is reaching your brand-specific audience–beyond age and gender. 
Trusted by Brands, Agencies and Media Partners

# Hear from Our Partners
“Working with Upwave has been a game-changer. Upwave’s platform and service model allowed us to scale brand measurement +10x in one year, and the insights provided by Upwave help us continuously monitor and optimize results on behalf of our advertising customers. Upwave has demonstrated a continuous dedication to innovation – from building our first-ever user-level brand measurement solution for baked in podcast ads, to delivering AI-supported insights reports. Together, we’ve built a relationship that fosters ongoing creativity and experimentation, and ultimately deliver measurable growth for our customers.” 
Alyson Sprague 
Wondery 
![](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/wondery.jpg)
"The depth of flexibility and analysis that Upwave provides is truly invaluable. Their innovative platform empowers us to dive-deep into the data and consistently uncover positive narratives that drive smarter decision-making." 
Karl Anderson 
Future Today 
![](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/future_today_logo.jpg)
“Strong brands are not built on clicks, but on memories. The brand that's remembered is the brand that is bought. With Upwave, you measure what really matters to your brand: familiarity, brand associations, ad recall, and purchase intent.” 
Pierre Bouvard 
Westwood One 
![](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/images-1.png)
“Upwave’s unique solution breaks the mold of standard brand equity measurement. Their solutions and willingness to innovate provide great value to my clients.” 
Melissa Scarlino 
UM Worldwide 
![](https://www.upwave.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Universal_McCann_logo-300x300-1-1-1.png)
“Our partnership with Upwave is a true example of innovation and collaboration. We’re able to go beyond traditional metrics, and make smarter creative decisions, optimize brand ROI for our customers, and ultimately build stronger campaigns.” 
Travis O’Neil 
GumGum

# Dynamic, Real-Time Dashboard to Maximize Brand Lift
With Upwave’s real-time platform, marketers can create dynamic campaign dashboards, access all modules, and easily see if the campaign is driving lift.
###  Cross-Channel Coverage 
Cross-channel measurement with accurate, privacy-safe data in a unified dashboard for CTV, Digital, Social, Linear, Addressable, Retail Media, and Streaming Audio. 
###  Granular Cut-Level Controls 
Evaluate Brand Lift at a tactical level, giving granular insights to compare performance of media, creative and more. 
###  Better Math and Methodology 
Upwave’s methodology is designed, and meticulously checked, to ensure our sample is high-quality, census-representative and clean of bias or other interference. 
# Put a Performance Lens on Brand Investment
Upwave allows marketers to regularly measure, improve, and maximize with an always-on, analytical rigor for brand campaigns.
![image⟨26⟩]
![image⟨27⟩]
###  AI-Powered Insights and Reports 
Upwave uses AI to help customers turn data into digestible, on-demand insights both in-platform and available to download–at the click of a button. 
###  Actionable Optimization Recommendations 
Upwave’s Brand Optimization is purpose-built as a tool for decision makers to clearly understand over–and underperforming–tactics, without a statistician on staff. 
###  On-Target Profiles and Reach 
Upwave uses real attitudinal data and machine learning to verify whether a campaign is reaching your brand-specific audience–beyond age and gender. 
Trusted by Brands, Agencies and Media Partners

generated_description:
### Upwave: Marketing Analytics for Brand Growth

**Overview:**
Founded in 2012 as a part of Y Combinator's Batch S12, Upwave is positioned as the leading marketing analytics platform designed for the world’s biggest brand marketers. Based in San Francisco, the company boasts a team of around 50 dedicated employees and is backed by esteemed investors like Uncork Capital and Initialized Capital.

**Mission:**
Upwave's mission is clear: to deliver precise marketing analytics that empower brand marketers to understand the effectiveness of their advertising investments. They tackle a fundamental question in the marketing world: "Does brand advertising work?" Through advanced data science and machine learning, they equip marketers with the tools to validate their marketing strategies.

**Target Audience:**
The platform is trusted by blue-chip clientele, including giants like Unilever, Verizon, and American Express, reflecting its robustness and reliability in enterprise solutions.

**Platform Capabilities:**
Upwave offers an enterprise platform that encompasses:
- **Brand Optimization:** Helps marketers allocate resources effectively to maximize ROI.
- **Brand Reach Validation:** Measures how well campaigns are reaching target audiences.
- **Brand Lift Measurement:** Quantifies the impact of marketing initiatives across various channels such as CTV, Digital, Linear, and Social.

The platform is designed for real-time data visualization, enabling users to create dynamic dashboards that track campaign performance and make informed decisions rapidly.

**Innovative Features:**
- **Cross-Channel Coverage:** Data is collected in a privacy-safe manner across multiple channels, giving a holistic view of brand engagement.
- **AI-Powered Insights:** Upwave utilizes AI technology to transform raw data into actionable insights without needing data science expertise in-house.
- **Granular Controls:** Allows marketers to dive deep into performance metrics, offering detailed comparisons of different media and creative strategies.

**Company Growth and Community:**
Upwave has gained recognition not just for its technology, but for its innovative spirit. It has a growing presence in the marketing technology landscape, fueled by positive testimonials from partners who cite transformative impacts on their brand strategies.

**What's Next?**
As Upwave continues to evolve, it emphasizes a commitment to enhancing tools that help brands navigate the complexities of modern marketing. By providing clear, measurable outcomes from brand investments, Upwave is set to redefine how companies perceive and manage their marketing strategies.

For more information, visit their official website at [Upwave](http://www.upwave.com). 

---

So if you're at the crossroads of marketing and needing a robust analytics solution, Upwave might just be the partner that can turn your vague questions into data-driven answers.
